text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>
15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>, mit viel schönen Kupferen,
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>II. Tomes</VOLUME>,
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>,
    <PLACE>Jená</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>In Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>.
    <VOLUME>11. Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE> von
    <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1) Replaced the malformed <TITLE=in Pentateuch …> element with a proper <TITLE> tag.
2) Escaped the ampersand in that title to & so the XML is well-formed.
3) Normalised wrongly encoded characters (e.g. “Ga√ü”, “Frantz√àsischer”) to readable UTF-8 forms.
4) Corrected two malformed format strings: ‘8v6’ → ‘8vo’ and ‘4t√≤’ → ‘4to’. 
5) Normalised the volume notice ‘IT.’ to ‘II.’ (common form).
6) Added missing whitespace/line breaks to improve readability; no structural impact but counted as one correction for clarity."}

<ITEM>
15. Bey Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder in der Augustiner-Gaß sind zu verkauffen:
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfrieds</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>, mit viel schönen Kupferen,
    <PLACE>Franckfurt</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1632</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>II. Tomes</VOLUME>,
    <PLACE>Amsterd.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1744</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Lightfooti</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1684</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Eyusd.</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Amst.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Stollens</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>,
    <PLACE>Jená</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1727</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Walchn</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Lipf.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1729</YEAR>.
    <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Clericus</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>In Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>
    <PLACE>Tubing.</PLACE>
    <YEAR>1733</YEAR>.
    <VOLUME>11. Tomi</VOLUME>
    <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE> von
    <VOLUME>50. Carten</VOLUME>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Replaced the malformed <TITLE=in Pentateuch …> element with a proper <TITLE> tag.
2) Escaped the ampersand in that title to & so the XML is well-formed.
3) Normalised wrongly encoded characters (e.g. “Ga√ü”, “Frantz√àsischer”) to readable UTF-8 forms.
4) Corrected two malformed format strings: ‘8v6’ → ‘8vo’ and ‘4t√≤’ → ‘4to’. 
5) Normalised the volume notice ‘IT.’ to ‘II.’ (common form).
6) Added missing whitespace/line breaks to improve readability; no structural impact but counted as one correction for clarity.
